import React, { useState } from "react"; // import FormGroup from "@mui/material/FormGroup"; // import { useFormik } from "formik"; // import * as Yup from 'yup'; import FormControl from "@mui/material/FormControl"; import FormLabel from "@mui/material/FormLabel"; import Select from "@mui/material/Select"; import InputLabel from "@mui/material/InputLabel"; import { Avatar } from "@material-ui/core"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import MenuItem from "@mui/material/MenuItem"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from "react-tabs"; import "react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css"; import StateData from "../../Util/States.json"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import axios from "axios"; import BASE_URL from "../../Util/API"; import numberFormat from "../../Util/CurrencyFormatter"; const NewLoan = () => { const initialState = { // "basic": { application_for: "", first_name: "", last_name: "", email: "", // applicationFor: "", gender: "", // date_of_birth: YYYY-MM-DD, marital_status: "", occupation: "", years_to_retired: 20, bank_indebtment: false, country: "Nigeria", state_of_origin: "", local_government_area: "", city: "", street: "", state_of_residence: "", phone_2: "", phone_1: "", means_of_id: "", id_number: "", id_expiry_date: "", }; const [state, setState] = useState(initialState); const { application_for, first_name, last_name, email, gender, date_of_birth, marital_status, occupation, years_to_retired, bank_indebtment, country, state_of_origin, local_government_area, city, street, state_of_residence, phone_2, phone_1, means_of_id, id_number, id_expiry_date, } = state; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setState({ ...state, [name]: value }); }; const handleBasicSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post(`${BASE_URL}/user/create`, { ...state, }) .then((response) => { console.log(response); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); toast.error("Oops! An error occured. Try again", { status: "error", }); }); }; return (
